Assets.Name: Isihlangu
Assets.Foreword: If you wield an isihlangu shield...
Assets.Ability1: When you Clash +iron and score a weak hit, you may choose to deal no harm. If you do, you have the initiative.
Assets.Ability2: When you Face Danger using your shield as cover, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit. On a miss, your shield is damaged and unusable until repaired or replaced.
Assets.Ability3: When you Secure an Advantage by leveraging your shield to get your foe into a vulnerable position, add +1. On a hit, you have the initiative.

Assets.Name: Iklwa
Assets.Foreword: If you wield an iklwa, a close-quarters, hand spear...
Assets.Ability1:
When you are in position to Strike at an unsuspecting or completely vulnerable foe, choose one (before rolling).
  • Add +2 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
  • Inflict +2 harm on a hit.
Assets.Ability2: When you Face Danger or Clash against a close-quarters fighting foe, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: When you Turn the Tide with a frenzy of slashing and piercing and your next move is a Strike, add +1 and inflict +2 harm on a strong hit.

Assets.Name: Iwisa
Assets.Foreword: If you wield an iwisa club made of stout leadwood...
Assets.Ability1: Your iwisa counts as a deadly weapon inflicting 2 harm. Additionally, when you Strike +edge by thorwing your iwisa, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability2: When you Strike and score a strong hit, take +1 momentum as the enemy is dazed. Then, if your next move is a Strike and you score a weak hit, you do not lose initiative.
Assets.Ability3: When you Clash or Face Danger by blocking incoming attacks with your iwisa, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Isijula
Assets.Foreword: If you wield an isijula throwing spear...
Assets.Ability1: When you Enter the Fray by throwing multiple spears in quick succession, you may roll +edge. If you do, choose one inflict your harm on a strong hit.
Assets.Ability2: When you Strike or Clash +edge by hurling a spear at a foe, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: When you Face Danger +edge to recover a thrown spear or to put distance between you and your foe, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Ingulule
Assets.Foreword: Your cheetah is swift and fierce.
Assets.Ability1: Sprint: When your cat chases down small game, you may Resupply with +edge (instead of +wits). If you do, take +1 supply or +1 momentum on a strong hit.
Assets.Ability2: Stalk: When you Gather Information by following your cat's lead in hunting your quarry, you may roll +shadow (instead of +wits). If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: Clamp: When you Secure an Advantage by having your cat bite down and restrain a foe of formidable or lower rank, roll +edge and add +1. On a strong hit, inflict I harm.

Assets.Name: Impisi
Assets.Ability1: Feeding Frenzy: When you Resupply, you may roll +iron instead of +wits. If you do, add +2 and suffer -1 supply on a hit.
Assets.Ability2: Scent: When you Gather Information using your hyena's senses to track your quarry or investigate a scene, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: Mockery: When you Secure an Advantage or Strike in a fight by distracting your foe with your hyena's eerie laughter, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Indlela Ye Inkentshane
Assets.Ability1: When you Face Danger, Gather Information, or Secure an Advantage leveraging your knowledge of tracking or large animals of the plains, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability2:
When you Undertake a Journey, you may choose an approach.
  • Focus: Add +2.
  • Endure: On a strong hit, mark progress a second time.
  • Exult: On a hit, take +2 momentum.
Assets.Ability3: When you Make Camp and miss, you may reroll one challenge die as you know how to make do with less.

Assets.Name: Obhejane
Assets.Foreword: Your rhino is an unstoppable force.
Assets.Ability1: Overrun: When you Strike or Clash by riding your rhino against a pack of foes, add +1 and inflict +1 harm on a hit.
Assets.Ability2: No Fear: When you Enter the Fray or Secure an Advantage by charging into combat, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability3: Hardened Hide: When you make the Companion Endure Harm move in a fight, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Sangoma
Assets.Ability1: When you implore the ancestral spirits to heal another person, roll +wits and add +1. On a strong hit, the patient mends or heartens (as in the Sojourn move). On a weak hit, as above but the spirits ask something of you in return.
Assets.Ability2: When you eat vision root and dream prophetic dreams, roll +wits and Endure Stress (1 stress). On a strong hit, you see a future failure that you can now avoid. Once before the next dawn when you miss on a non-progress roll, you may improve it to a strong hit. On a weak hit, as above but improve the miss to a weak hit instead.
Assets.Ability3: After you Swear an Iron Vow to heal an ally of a bane or burden, one time only you may consult the ancestral spirits for guidance. If you do, roll +wits. On a hit, you conceive of a medicinal muti and the ingredients required. Take +2 momentum. On a strong hit, also reduce the rank of the vow one step.

Assets.Name: Indlela Ye Inyathi
Assets.Ability1: When you Battle +wits by leading groups of warriors in a pincer attack or Secure an Advantage +wits in combat by coordinating a pincer attack with allies, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.
Assets.Ability2:
When you Enter the Fray or Clash by charging in a blind rage, choose one.
  • Fury: Roll +iron. Inflict +1 harm on a strong hit.
  • Courage: Roll +heart. Add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.<.li>
Assets.Ability3: When you Draw the Circle after a display of physical intimidation, you may roll +iron (instead of +heart). If you do, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit. Additionally, when you Compel using physical intimidation, add +1 and take +1 momentum on a hit.

Assets.Name: Ukuhlanzwa
Assets.Ability1: When you paint your face and body to purify yourself before battle, roll +wits. On a strong hit, your spirit is pure. Take +2 momentum and add +1 the next time you Enter the Fray. On a weak hit, only take +1 momentum.
Assets.Ability2: When you sprinkle yourself with ceremonial water mixed with the blood of fallen foes, roll +wits. On a strong hit, the next time you Endure Harm in a fight, you ignore all harm. On a weak hit, as above but reduce harm suffered by 2 instead.
Assets.Ability3: When you perform qaqa, the ritual disemboweling of a fallen enemy to release its spirit, roll +heart. On a strong hit, the spirit honors your act. Take +2 momentum and +1 spirit. On a weak hit, the spirit gives you a warning. Ask the Oracle for the nature of the warning. Then, take +1 momentum and add +1 to the next move you make leveraging this knowledge.
